current.disclaimer:
Functional Patterns is not a referral service and does not recommend or endorse any particular practitioner and/or personal trainer. Rather, Functional Patterns is only an intermediary that provides contact information about practitioners and/or personal trainers. We do not offer advice regarding the quality or suitability of any particular practitioner and/or personal trainer, and no information on this Site should be construed as health or medical advice. Functional Patterns does not inspect or maintain any facilities at which any training sessions are to take place; or provide any assurances regarding the safety and suitability of any equipment used at any session; and is not responsible for the behavior of any practitioner and/or trainer. By scheduling a session, you are agreeing that Functional Patterns has no liability whatsoever for any injury, death, or property damage suffered by you in connection with such training session or consultation, including any intentional or unintentional negligence on the part of the practitioner and/or personal trainer for proper use, repair, maintenance, and upkeep of the equipment and/or facility. You should obtain any additional information necessary to make an informed decision prior to utilizing any specific practitioner and/or personal trainer.


You assume all responsibility in connection with choosing any practitioner and/or personal trainer, whether or not you obtained information about such practitioner and/or personal trainer through this Site.


Functional Patterns assumes no (and hereby disclaims all) responsibility or liability of any kind, for any advice other services rendered by any practitioner and/or personal trainer for any claims and other claims that may arise directly or indirectly from any such advice or services.


Limitation of Liability


IN NO EVENT SHALL FUNCTIONAL PATTERNS BE LIABLE FOR ANY INJURY, LOSS, CLAIM, OR DAMAGES (INCLUDING INDIRECT, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES) OF ANY KIND, WHETHER BASED IN CONTRACT, TORT, OR OTHERWISE, WHICH ARISES OUT OF OR IS ANY WAY CONNECTED WITH (I) ANY USE OF THE SERVICES, THE SITE, OR ITS CONTENT, (II) ANY FAILURE OR DELAY (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE ANY COMPONENT OF THE SERVICES OR THE SITE

FOR SCHEDULING PURPOSES), OR (III) THE PERFORMANCE OR NON-PERFORMANCE OF ANY PRACTITIONER AND/OR PERSONAL TRAINER OR CLIENT IN CONNECTION WITH THE SERVICES AND/OR PROPER USE, REPAIR, MAINTENANCE, AND UPKEEP OF THE FACILITY/EQUIPMENT, EVEN IF FUNCTIONAL PATTERNS HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

settings.subtitle: Make Gains Without The Pains
settings.desc_text: We Take the Guesswork Out of Taking Care of Your Body!

settings.description_1: ...through the use of myofascial manipulation and corrective exercise.
...to allow your muscles to work for you and not against you.
...by conditioning your movement and muscle symmetry.
...in a way that simultaneously improves function and performance.
...with increased economy of motion helping you feel great.
...as relief from muscle tension and joint pain get resolved at its root.

settings.subtitle: OUR METHOD
settings.title: WHAT IS FUNCTIONAL PATTERNS?
settings.description: Functional Patterns is fitness training designed for humans by humans. By cracking the code on the way we've evolved to move, we supercharge your body's ability to move better, and teach you how to train without all the pains that typically come with other training methods.

settings.testimonial: Functional patterns is the only training methodology that has gotten me out of chronic pain and constantly keeping me out of pain.
settings.author: Shannon Hegarty
settings.bottom_heading:
See results like this and more,
from all around the globe.

settings.subtitle:
10-week
online course
settings.desc_text: In our courses we break down complicated subject matter into easily digestible bits so you can apply it in your everyday life.
